/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The sky is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Power lines stretch across the sky, connecting the buildings that stand tall in the background. These buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, add a modern touch to the scene.

The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the sky. The combination of natural and man-made elements creates a harmonious balance, reflecting the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
